name: Emergency Shutoff
description: The organization provides, for specific locations within a facility containing concentrations of information system resources, the capability of shutting off power to any information system component that may be malfunctioning or threatened without endangering personnel by requiring them to approach the equipment.\n
supplemental_guidance: Facilities containing concentrations of information system resources may include, for example, data centers, server rooms, and mainframe rooms.\n
enhancements: (1) The organization protects the emergency power-off capability from accidental or unauthorized activation.\n
